2.1.name: wordpress/romanian-tv-online-widget
2.1.description:
RO: Cu ajutorul acestui plugin puteti afisa intr-un widget posturile dumneavoastra preferate. Acest plugin va permite sa alegeti dumneavoastra posturile tv pe care le afisati pe site-ul sau blogul dumneavoastra.

PS: Toate linkurile sunt NOfollow.

EN : With this plugin you can display a widget with your favorite tv stations. This plugin allows you to choose the TV stations that you want to display on your site or blog.

PS : All links are NOfollow
